mainText: Many families across South Carolina face challenges like financial hardship, housing instability, or limited access to health education. These invisible burdens can make it harder to keep babies safeâ€”especially during sleep. Our mission is to support these families through community-driven education and wellness resources, so every child has a safe, healthy start in life.
